education.summary: Advisor: Dr. J. Benjamin Falandays; Committee: Dr. Thomas Morgan, Dr. Derek Powell. Thesis: Network Structure and Language Evolution: From Coordination to Cumulative Culture.
Supervisor: Dr. G. Reza Jafari. Coursework in Complex Systems, Stochastic Processes, Artificial Intelligence, and Numerical Simulations.

work.name: PALM Lab, Arizona State University
work.summary: Develop agent-based models of cultural evolution and language emergence; investigate co-evolution of networks and communication using Bayesian learning.

research.title: Co-evolution of Language and Networks through Agent-Based Modeling
highlights: Large-scale ABMs of communicative success and cultural convergence
Dynamic network mechanisms (preferential attachment, triadic closure)
Metrics for complexity, stability, and alignment

research.title: Wealth Perception in Inequality: Digital Trace Data
highlights: Multimodal AI pipeline (Florence-2, GPT-4o, OCR) to detect wealth cues
Sentiment analysis and topic modeling of Instagram discourse

research.title: Community Detection in Political Twitter Networks
highlights: Detected opinion communities in Iranian election discourse
Network visualization with Gephi; polarization analysis
